title: Share of population that uses a smartphone in North America 2011 to 2018
summary: In general Share of population has rose over the Year.
Share of population is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Share of population, about 64.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Share of population about 45.1 was reached at Year 2013
